title: That the General Committee minutes for the regular and special meetings of March 7 and 14, 2022 be approved.

That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report CSAD22-022, dated April 4, 2022, of the Commissioner of Community Services, as follows: That, respecting the License Agreement between the City and The Peterborough Agricultural Society, Staff be authorized to proceed, as amended, as outlined in Closed Session Report CSAD22-022, dated April 4, 2022, from the Commissioner of Community Services.
That items 12.a.1, 12.a.3, and 12.a.4  be approved as part of the Consent Agenda.

That Council approve the recommendations outlined in Report CSACH22-006, dated April 4, 2022 of the Commissioner of Community Services as follows: a) That the current Policy, attached as Appendix A to Report CSACH22-006, be rescinded; and, b) That the amended Public Art Policy, attached as Appendix B to Report CSA22- 006, be approved.

That Council approve the recommendations outlined in Report CSACH22-006, dated April 4, 2022 of the Commissioner of Community Services as follows: a) That the current Policy, attached as Appendix A to Report CSACH22-006, be rescinded; and, b) That the amended Public Art Policy, attached as Appendix B to Report CSA22- 006, be approved. That Council approve the recommendations outlined in Report IPSIM22-009 dated April 4, 2022, of the Interim Commissioner of Infrastructure and Planning Services, as follows: a) That a Non-Standard Procurement for the supply of 16 Electric Vehicle charging ports for City fleet-use be awarded to Elexicon Group Inc., 100 Taunton Road East, Whitby, Ontario, L1N 5R8 at a cost of $155,700 plus $20,241 HST for a total cost of $175,941; and, b) That subject to a successful grant application, Council approve up to $84,000, plus HST of $10,920, of the previously committed funding from the Municipal Electric Vehicle Charging Station capital project budget be used for 8 public-use Electric Vehicle charging ports.
That this meeting adjourn at 6:23 p.m.
